colombian_food.name: Ajiaco
colombian_food.description: Soup made with potatoes, chicken, corn, and guascas. Native ingredients blend with capers and chicken.

colombian_food.name: Tamales
colombian_food.description: Corn or rice dough stuffed with meats, vegetables, sauces, and other ingredients, wrapped in vegetable leaves.

colombian_food.name: Sancocho
colombian_food.description: Sancocho is basically a very thick soup made with root vegetables and different types of meats in a broth, usually flavored.

paisa_food.name: Paisa Arepas
paisa_food.description: Typical arepas from the Antioquia region.

paisa_food.name: Bandeja Paisa
paisa_food.description: It includes white rice, red beans, chicharr√≥n, Antioquian chorizo, fried egg, ripe plantain, avocado, and arepa.

paisa_food.name: Antioquean Beans
paisa_food.description: They are prepared with beans, tomatoes, onion, garlic, carrot, plantain, pig's hoof, chicharron, and cilantro.
